casebody.data:
David PLUMLEY, Trustee of the Erma Rogers Revocable Trust, on Behalf of the Trust and Others Similarly Situated Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
ERICKSON RETIREMENT COMMUNITIES, Redwood Capital Investments, Inc., Senior Campus Living, Inc., and Senior Campus Services, LLC Defendants,
and
Henry Ford Village, Inc., Redwood-Erc Management, LLC, and Life Care Services, LLC, Defendants-Appellants. SC: 157096
COA: 332495 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 30, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellee to file an answer in excess of the page limitation is GRANTED. The 58-page answer submitted on March 20, 2018, is accepted for filing.
